Articles.Content:
After seeing many impressive stations around the interwebs, I decided to build and post my own. Now presenting, The Olympus!

The station before both power arms were attached.

Both power arms in place(not rotated the same, but who's perfect:D) and the RCS fuel reserves.

Added the temporary tug. Not perfect, up for suggestions.

Super-structure in place. Not that you can see it from this angle:P

Docking first fuel tank (thanks to Vanamode for the rocket design to get it there)

Jebediah's view from the observatory/command pod.

Final view. Still to be added is the Olympus Mun bus and a new docking tug.
Nice station. I need to add more fuel to mine since its been sucked dry by my ships.
